entry.title: Documentation Update
entry.content:
The documentation regarding the whole C++ML standard is now available !

We recently integrated a documentation generator and were able to produce a user-friendly documentation. It is available in the above menu or at the fallowing address. http://www.cplusplusml.org/documentation.html

Again, feel free to send any bug report or suggestion to contact<at>cplusplusml.org

entry.title: Happy New Year !
entry.content:
The whole C++ML team wishes you an happy new year !

2012 has been a busy year and we are glad to annouce that despite the tight schedule, we excpect the first stable release of our Graphical Editor to be released soon.

May 2013 be a year of excinting new projects. With the help of C++ML conception.

The C++ML Team

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
